sentences: Nils Thore "Nick" Borgen, born 5 January 1952 in Andenes, Nordland, is a Norwegian–Swedish musician, singer and writer (debut novel: "Den okända soldaten", 2009).
He's famous for songs like We Are All the Winners and Den glider in.
Between 1990 and 2005, he had an own dansband, Nick Borgens orkester.
